entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a student who is furious about the cancellation of the trip to Hogsmeade. He says it's on his birthday and he was looking forward to it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned alongside Ron as a student who is living proof that something has happened.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as saying it's not a big surprise that the trip to Hogsmeade was cancelled, given what happened to Katie.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as someone who has still not returned from St Mungo's after something happened to her.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a location where the students were supposed to go on a trip.

entities.name: st mungo's
entities.description: St Mungo's is mentioned as a hospital where Katie has not returned from.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that reported further disappearances including several relatives of students at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Ron was looking forward to visiting Hogsmeade on his birthday.
Katie has not returned from St Mungo's.
Ron is now looking forward to learning Apparition.
